summary.span: 表示 控制項中的個別項目。

span.span: Represents an individual item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來表示中的個別項目控制項。The class is used to represent an individual item in a control. 個別項目通常表示的基礎資料來源中的記錄控制項。An individual item usually represents a record in the underlying data source of a control. 在每個項目控制項都有指定的項目類型下, 表所示。Each item in the control has a designated item type, as listed in the following table. |項目類型Item type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| || 控制項中的資料項目。A data item in the control.| || 控制項中的插入項目。An insert item in the control.| || 控制項中的空白項目。An empty item in the control. 空的項目會顯示當控制項並沒有任何記錄，若要顯示，或在群組時控制項沒有任何要顯示的多筆記錄。The empty item is displayed when the control does not have any records to display, or when a group in the control does not have any more records to display.| 若要判斷的型別物件，請使用屬性。To determine the type of a object, use the property. 如果項目包含其他控制項，您可以使用來擷取控制項的項目集合。If an item contains other controls, you can retrieve a control by using the collection of the item. 如果控制項的屬性設定，您也可以使用找不到控制項的方法。If the control's property is set, you can also use the method to find the control. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來存取中建立項目的屬性控制項。The following example shows how to use the class to access the properties of the item that is being created in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem/CS/ListViewItemCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem/VB/ListViewItemVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件的項目型別。

span.span: Gets the item type of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷的型別項目物件代表下表所示。Use the property to determine the type of item that the object represents, as listed in the following table. |項目類型Item type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| || 控制項中的資料項目。A data item in the control.| || 控制項中的插入項目。An insert item in the control.| || 控制項中的空白項目。An empty item in the control. 空的項目會顯示當控制項並沒有任何記錄，若要顯示，或在群組時控制項沒有任何要顯示的多筆記錄。The empty item is displayed when the control does not have any records to display, or when a group in the control does not have any more records to display.| 通常，您會使用這個屬性來判斷項目類型，才能執行作業。You typically use this property to determine an item's type before you perform an operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否正在建立的項目是資料的項目。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether the item that is being created is a data item. 如果項目資料的項目，電子郵件地址會顯示為斜體。If the item is a data item, the email address is displayed in italic. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem/CS/ListViewItemCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem/VB/ListViewItemVB.aspx#2)]
